tidbits.title: Thracian Legacy
tidbits.description: Bulgaria has a rich cultural heritage from the Thracians, seen in ancient tombs, gold treasures like the Panagyurishte and Varna Gold, and intricate craftsmanship.

tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: Bulgaria offers diverse landscapes, from the stunning Black Sea coastline and sandy beaches to the majestic Balkan Mountains and picturesque countryside.

tidbits.title: Rituals and Folklore
tidbits.description: Bulgaria celebrates vibrant traditions, including folklore music, lively festivals like Surva, and unique rituals like the Nestinarstvo fire dancing.
